name: Geometry Dash (itch) (Vulture Limited)
description:
This is a 2d scrolling adventure game

Up arrow button or Space Button for jumping

Click on the level for playing the level

Click on the arrow logo for changing the level

If your character in this game is in the airplane use the Up arrow key and Down Arrow Key for going up and down

Avoid Spikes

Follow me on itch.io

Follow my account on Scratch

Link of the Scratch:https://scratch.mit.edu/users/ScratcherRounak/

Enjoy this game:
